definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: Who will rise up for me against the evildoers?
sentences.chinese: 誰肯爲我起來攻擊作惡的。

sentences.english: The wizard uttered a spell against the wicked king.
sentences.chinese: 男巫對作惡多端的國王唸咒法。

sentences.english: Gushan to have turned evil, never to month Begonia trouble.
sentences.chinese: 到得孤山翻作惡，海棠鬧月不曾來。

sentences.english: Let the perpetrator free from of your enmity and ultimately you will be on top.
sentences.chinese: 不要憎恨作惡者，最終你將會高屋建瓴。

sentences.english: Who will rise up for me against the wicked?
sentences.chinese: 誰肯爲我起來攻擊作惡的。

sentences.english: The perpetrator was tracked to Germany, where he was sentenced a year later.
sentences.chinese: 作惡者被追蹤到德國，一年以後，在那接受審判。

sentences.english: He defended his remark about "chickens coming home to roost".
sentences.chinese: 他爲他那番“作惡者必自斃”的言論進行辯護。

sentences.english: You are day and night oppressed with the sting of iniquity for the crimes and wanton cruelties you have committed.
sentences.chinese: 您整日悶悶不樂是因爲您慘無人道，作惡多端。

sentences.english: Giulio Aleni affirmed that anima had two tendencies, that is the good and the evil.
sentences.chinese: 艾儒略肯定靈魂有爲善作惡兩種傾向。

sentences.english: Berlusconi said the affair was the result of "media criminality".
sentences.chinese: 貝魯斯科尼說這一事件是“媒體作惡”的結果。

sentences.english: Magnon was a sort of fashionable woman in the sphere of crime.
sentences.chinese: 馬儂姑娘是一種作惡的漂亮人物。

sentences.english: They called down punishment on the people for their evil ways.
sentences.chinese: 他們祈求老天爺懲罰那些作惡多端的人。

sentences.english: Ch'eng-Huang also exposes evil-doers in the community itself, usually through dreams.
sentences.chinese: 城王也在社區中揭露作惡者，通常是通過夢來揭發。

sentences.english: He can use his gifts, and not abuse them.
sentences.chinese: 他可以運用他的天賦，但不濫用它們去作惡。

sentences.english: Galaad is a city of workers of idols, supplanted with blood.
sentences.chinese: 基肋阿得是座作惡者的城池，滿了血跡。

sentences.english: Who rejoice to do evil, and delight in the frowardness of the wicked;
sentences.chinese: 喜歡作惡，喜愛惡人的乖僻。

definition: to be greedy in getting money
to convert to (a religion)/to rely upon/refuge/mainstay
virtue has its rewards (idiom); one good turn deserves another
